sense.def:
To laugh
pomeni ustvarjati zvok, ki kaže, da smo veseli ali se zabavamo.

seg.quote: He grinned, then started to laugh.
The young men laughed at his jokes.
‘Hurry up,’ said Tony with a laugh.

sense.def:
To have the last laugh
pomeni uspeti potem, ko je že kazalo, da smo poraženi.

seg.quote: Henry had outlived all the others to have the last laugh.

sense.def:
To laugh at someone or something
pomeni rogati se ali zbijati šale na račun nekoga ali nečesa.

seg.quote: I don't think it's nice to laugh at people's disabilities.

sense.def:
To laugh off a serious situation
pomeni namigniti, da je resen položaj zabaven in nepomemben.

cit.quote: obrniti na hec, vzeti s smešne plati

seg.quote: Northcliffe attempted to laugh the matter off.
